name: Tiny, Beasty & Bee
description:
Tiny, Beasty & Bee

With powers to transform into a nimble Bee and a great Beast, Tiny will hopefully be able to stop the wicked Zachavillain before it's too late.

Controls Keyboard

A or D to move

W to transform into Bee

S transforms into Beasty

Space for jump/attack/fly


Touch Screen

Tap:

Bottom left/right to move

Top left to transform to Beasty

Top right transforms into Bee

Bottom center to jump/attack/fly
